title: Crocodile's Former Gender Theory
theory: Some fans theorize that Crocodile was originally female before Ivankov's gender-changing powers transformed him into a man. This theory is supported by hints in later arcs and Crocodile's mysterious past.
author: Multiple fans across Reddit and forums
evidence: Crocodile's reaction to Ivankov in later arcs suggests a secret
The live-action adaptation's opening scene possibly showing a younger female Crocodile
Oda's early character designs potentially showing different gender presentation
counterEvidence: Could be misinterpretation of visual cues

title: Ancient Weapon Pluton Connection
theory: Crocodile's true goal in Operation Utopia is to obtain the ancient weapon Pluton, which is believed to be hidden somewhere in Arabasta. The throne is secondary to this ultimate objective.
author: Multiple fans
evidence: Crocodile hints at something of 'significant importance related to military power' in Arabasta
Nico Robin's ability to read Poneglyphs is crucial to his plan
Later episodes explicitly reveal Pluton is his true objective
